render

public java.lang.String render(int depth,
                               java.util.HashMap<Instance,Bag> instanceBags)
Recursively renders this node and its branches as a tabbed out tree

Returns:
a string containing the node and its children, tabbed to the given depth

trimNegativeBranches

public boolean trimNegativeBranches()
Recursively removes all branches that do not contain a positive leaf. Used to create partial tree for MIRI rule learner.

Returns:
true if a positive leaf was encountered during the trim
